jp_text: あんた　旅館のこと　仕事なんだと思ってんの
google_translated: I think it's a job about an inn

en_text: Well, I mean, it's not like I came here for work...
jp_text: そんな　だって私　ここに仕事をしにきたわけじゃないし　それに…
google_translated: That's why I'm not working here and I'm here ...

en_text: You know what,
jp_text: あんたさあ

en_text: I didn't come here because I wanted to work.
jp_text: 仕事なんてしたくて　ここにきたわけじゃない
google_translated: I want to work and I'm not here

jp_text: なのに…

en_text: and it was agonizing.
jp_text: 悔しくて　悔しかった

en_text: Call the landlady!
jp_text: 女将を呼べ！

en_text: You don't have any friends, do you?
jp_text: お前さあ　友達ないだろう

en_text: Let's call the police.
jp_text: 警察を呼びましょう

en_text: I'm so frustrated with you two-
jp_text: 私　腹いせされなくっちゃ…

en_text: Really, just what do I want to do?
jp_text: 本当は私　何したいんだろう
google_translated: I really want to do anything

en_text: Revenge is best served on a dish
jp_text: あれはないじゃない
